name: Thanks 4 Da Lava Golem
author: ☥BriMs☥
notes:
Thought it would be cool to tech in give an take it helps vs the hazy match up or people trying to play around lava golem.. 

 also if they econ tribute ya lava golem, u can give an take it right back. On there field

Legend is cancer right now with all the 3sd players, FTK decks an CA looking for a quick KOG an this deck cucks them all.
